oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Sheet music "When a Blue Service Star Turns Gold"
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: "When a Blue Service Star Turns Gold" is a World War I era song which references the tradition of placing a blue star banner on the homes of those with loved ones in service. A gold star reprsented that a loved one had died in service. This sheet music belonged to the Estep or the McAllister families in Giles County, Tennessee.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: World War, 1914-1918; World War, 1914-1918 - History
